name: MyCounter
0:
”Alexa, ask my counter to increment counter”
”Alexa, ask my counter for current value”
”Alexa, ask my counter to reset counter”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my counter
des: The skill keep track of a personal simple counter to record and track any activity. You can ask the skill to increment the counter value when you do some activity or task. This can be used for a recurring activity like gym visits, cycling etc. You can also reset the counter whenever you need to.
